title: Let contact manager process contacts even without subscribers

content.raw:
The contact manager currently only processes contacts when there are subscribers to the contacts topic. This is where the check happens:

#!/osrf/gazebo/src/20229b3a94252b177973f5d82239a686d9ab00bf/gazebo/physics/ContactManager.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#ContactManager.cc-138

This means that someone wanting to use `ContactManager::GetContacts` without subscribing to a topic, must create a dummy subscriber just to allow the contacts to be processed.

It would be nice to decouple the transport logic from the contact processing logic. This could be as simple as adding a flag such as `processContacts` with setter and getter.
